name: Police Air Plane Flight Simulator 3D
description:
Ever dreamed about a brilliant career of policeman? Or maybe you wanted to be a driver or pilot, aren’t you? Now you have a chance to combine your skills and wishes with Police Air Plane Flight Simulator 3D! Deliver police cars from one airport to another and serve your country!
In this game you aren’t going to enquire criminal cases and chase fugitives! Here you have a special mission: you should deliver very important police cars safe and sound! Get an unusual flight, driving and parking experience at the same time with Police Air Plane Flight Simulator 3D!
Help the police with their important duty, fit within the other brave drivers and let every delivery be successful! Drive and park cars into the cargo hold, then take the pilot seat in the police plane and enjoy the flight! Don’t forget about the main challenge: fast and careful delivery is really vital when there is a matter of life and death!
Murderers, robbers, kidnappers and pushers can’t be caught without the police autos! Join the fight between these bad people and brave cops! Provide an air support to your police crew! Be right in the middle of the action! Earn points, test all equipment and unlock new achievements!
Police Air Plane Flight Simulator 3D features:
• Great cargo plane
• Interesting combination
• Level up your skills
• Upgrade your plain earning points
• Become the best police pilot ever!
Become a certified aircraft pilot cop and get ready to racing! Hurry up, the criminals won’t be waiting for your activity! Join the police army in Police Air Plane Flight Simulator 3D!
